scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Achievements_UserList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="Title" defaultValue="${resource:Achievements_UserList_Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="sortBy" labelResourceName="SortBy" defaultValue="DateCreated" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="DateCreated" labelResourceName="SortBy_DateCreated" /> <propertyValue value="Title" labelResourceName="SortBy_Title" /> </property> <property id="sortOrder" labelResourceName="SortOrder" defaultValue="Descending" dataType="String"> <propertyValue value="Ascending" labelResourceName="SortOrder_Ascending" /> <propertyValue value="Descending" labelResourceName="SortOrder_Descending" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" labelResourceName="PageSize" defaultValue="20" dataType="Int"> <propertyRule name="minmax" min="1" max="100" /> </property> <property id="enablePaging" labelResourceName="EnablePaging" defaultValue="true" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Achievements_UserList_Description">Displays a list of users who have received an achievement</resource> <resource name="Achievements_UserList_Name">Achievement - User List</resource> <resource name="Achievements_UserList_Title">Recently achieved by</resource> <resource name="EnablePaging">Enable Paging</resource> <resource name="NoMembers">No members have attained this achievement.</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="PageSize">Number of items to display</resource> <resource name="SortBy">Sort By</resource> <resource name="SortBy_DateCreated">Date Received</resource> <resource name="SortBy_Title">Achievement Title</resource> <resource name="SortOrder">Sort Order</resource> <resource name="SortOrder_Ascending">Ascending</resource> <resource name="SortOrder_Descending">Descending</resource> <resource name="Title">Widget Title</resource> </language>
